content: Great write Elle Kaplan. All the skills mentioned by you do add value to our daily routine and improve our productivity. One more thing ,which I would like add here is that “spend a fixed time everyday towards your passion.” This passion can be anything from writing to Robotics,but spending and finding some time everyday for our passion not only makes our life more fulfilling and also plants the seeds for Entrepreneurship,in case we want to start at some point of time.I personally found habit very motivating ,even in my workplace.
